experience.name: Boingo Wireless Inc.
experience.about: Boingo Wireless (NASDAQ: WIFI) helps the world stay connected, in places as varied as airports, stadiums, shopping malls, restaurants, universities, and military bases.
experience.title: Web Engineer
experience.jobDescription: As a front-end web engineer at Boingo, I am responsible for updating the corporate and other web systems, creating markup (HTML/CSS) and logic (PHP/JS/Jquery) as required. In my manager's absence I supervise our group's deliverables and prioritizations and manage expectations with stakeholders. We work both as an Agile (Scrum) and Kanban group and deliver multiple web builds to production on a weekly basis. I also setup and support A/B test campaigns for our Marketing and Product groups using Adobe's Omniture platform. I've helped develop our current process workflow: 1) Ticket creation, 2) Communication with Stakeholder, 3) Prioritization, 4) Analysis/Diagnose/Design/Development/Unit test, 5) QA Handoff/iteration, 6) Certification, 7) Delivery/Resolution.
responsibilities: Create A/B campaigns for Marketing and Product departments using Adobe's Omniture service and resolve ensuing conflicts (Markup/JS/Jquery)
Deliver weekly web builds to production
Manage web group in our Director's absence, overseeing Sprint planning, task prioritization, communicating risk with stakeholders, managing production hotfixes
projects: Boingo's Wifinder App: created web pages used in version 1 of app, supporting iOS and Android mobile and tablet layouts.
Create/maintain many of our venues websites, most recently using responsive design
Converted first generation venues existing graphical based layouts to proper markup to streamline updating/new venue creation tasks

experience.name: Capital Group Companies
experience.about: American Funds is a sub-division of Cap Group Companies (Global company) and is a privately held investment management firm.
experience.title: Front-End Coder
experience.jobDescription: Completed two 6-month contract terms with Cap Group. Working in a collaborative environment and communicating with copy editors, migration specialists, senior coders, project managers and business analysts, my primary responsibility was to respond to submitted CRs (change requests), update files and test locally on “Alpha desktops” and after proper review to deliver them to staging servers. Updated files included html, css, xml, some .jsp and .js.
responsibilities: Work closely with production and migration specialists, copy editors, business analysts, project managers and back-end developers
Attend weekly front-end coder and back-end developer meetings
projects: 'Year-end' project: Updated a large number of pages on americanfunds.com containing year specific tax information

experience.name: Murad Inc.
experience.about: Murad is a leader in the skincare industry creating, marketing and selling award winning skincare products throughout the USA and globally.
experience.title: Web Designer
experience.jobDescription: As the company's only Web developer, worked closely with the marketing, creative and IT departments, to build optimized and cross-browser & platform compliant landing pages, mini-sites and other related websites for murad.com. Also created weekly HTML marketing emails, and performed most front-end content updates on murad.com.
responsibilities: Updating products on murad.com via Oracle Applications (Istore)
Assist departments with website statistics analysis (SiteCatalyst)
projects: Web-chat and Email management by InstantService

endorsements.title: Web designer
endorsements.comments: Harma is an incredibly skilled and proficient HTML and CSS developer. He is one of the few developers I've worked with who can actually see the design and write the code to match it perfectly. If there is an issue with the design in that it cannot be created in HTML/CSS, Harma will help you find a solution. He's a go-to for my freelance projects and if I work in Los Angeles again, I hope we can work together. I highly recommend him

endorsements.title: Senior Director
endorsements.comments: Working with Harma while he was at Murad was a great experience. Anytime we had to work on a detailed analysis or enhance Murad's analytics systems, he was quick to understand and excellent in implementing enhancements properly the first time around. He is definitely someone who is passionate about his work and will find the best and cost-effective solution to getting tasks completed. He'll definitely be a Great asset to any company he works with.

experience.name: Stormscape Studios
experience.about: As an entrepreneur, I have been building websites under this DBA since 2000. Freelancing satisfies my creative instincts and enables me to experiment with technologies and manage projects from wireframes to launch to support.
experience.title: Freelancer
experience.jobDescription: Working as an independent web designer/developer and entrepreneur, I have been creating websites professionally for the last 10 years. Development philosophy is: Simple is good. Clients include attorneys, politicians, medical groups, teachers associations, restaurants and other small businesses. Visit stormscape.com/portfolio to see a listing of web projects.

experience.name: Unitedlayer Inc.
experience.about: UnitedLayer is a small server collocation and management company with data centers in San Francisco and Los Angeles.
experience.title: Web Designer
experience.jobDescription: Contracted on-location for a full year (Los Angeles and San Francisco) my main duty was to research the current hosting collocation industry and redesign the UnitedLayer website, improving its functionality and implementing new communication ideology focused on selling complex services through clear presentation and understandable content.
responsibilities: Website design and development including page/template design, photography and image optimization
Writing technical content to appeal to the business “Decision-Maker” audience

experience.name: HostPro LLC
experience.about: HostPro was a web hosting company during the .com boom. It grew in size and was acquired by Micron PC and later by Interland.
experience.title: Web Hosting/Ecommerce Sales, Sales Manager
experience.jobDescription: As a Sales Representative at HostPro, my primary responsibilities included selling hosting technologies to clients by phone and email. This is where I had an opportunity to really learn about internet infrastructure, DNS, server management and datacenter operations. Initially we sold shared web hosting accounts, but soon started offering ecommerce solutions and finally dedicated server packages. I was promoted to Sales Manager and was responsible for hiring and training a staff of 8 sales reps in our Los Angeles office.
responsibilities: Selling shared web hosting plans, ecommerce solutions, and dedicated server packages
Managing Los Angeles based hosting resellers and training junior sales staff about web hosting
Hiring, training and managing a staff of 8 in Los Angeles
Training general Micron PC sales staff on web-hosting technologies and sales (Boise, ID)
Managing company booths in several internet conventions (Internet World in Los Angeles and Boston)
Assisted with company intranet usability design
projects: Authored Ecommerce whitepapers which were published on website
Top salesmen and a leader in client retention and satisfaction

experience.name: Earthlink Network
experience.about: EarthLink Network is one of the largest ISP's in the United States.
experience.title: Technical Support Representative
responsibilities: Assisting customers with browser and email setup
Selling EarthLink connectivity plans by phone & email
Helping agents with escalated support tickets
projects: Competed 18,000 support and sales calls in three years
